::FireBlade::
FireBlade grimaced at words of Megatron and the as the hand flew at 
him he through his sword in front of it. However from the battle and 
the results of the acid pellts fom Prowl the hand of Megatron flew 
right through the sword breaking it in half and nailing him across 
the face. FireBlades head twitched slightly from the hit but this bot 
wsa not weak.
"I am sorry commander Sir!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> OOC: Dont be offended by what Megatron does here, he is after all a 
> jerk.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Megatron looked up at both of them. He didnt care that they were 
> taller (it's not a big deal guys). He snarled, then grimaced. He 
then 
> took a few breaths and calmed down. "No, you followed orders 
Autofire, 
> and for that I commend you,". He then quickly snarled, "but when I 
> want your opinion Fireblade, I'LL GIVE IT TO YOU" he yelled as he 
sent 
> a flailing backhand towards the taller robot. With Megatron's 
> strength, it didnt matter how tall the robot was.
